plot: Thinking he may inherit a million dollars from his dying grandmother, Joe McDoakes finds himself the target of murderously greedy family members.
title: So You Want to Be an Heir
plot_es: Thinking he may inherit a million dollars from his dying grandmother, Joe McDoakes finds himself the target of murderously greedy family members.
original_name: So You Want to Be an Heir
plot_en: Thinking he may inherit a million dollars from his dying grandmother, Joe McDoakes finds himself the target of murderously greedy family members.

cast.role: Joe McDoakes /              Uncle Silas /              Ellery /              Cousin Agatha /              Grandmother
cast.name: George O'Hanlon
